lead_paragraph: The organizers of Qatar's 2022 World Cup said on Sunday they were investigating the death of an Indian laborer at one of its sites but denied it was caused by working conditions which the wealthy Gulf country is under pressure to improve.

headline.print_headline: Qatar Investigates Death at World Cup Site as Labor Rights Under Scrutiny
headline.main: Qatar Investigates Death at World Cup Site as Labor Rights Under Scrutiny

snippet: The organizers of Qatar's 2022 World Cup said on Sunday they were investigating the death of an Indian laborer at one of its sites but denied it was caused by working conditions which the wealthy Gulf country is under pressure to improve....
